attributes.action: Make Fox Hunting Legal again, and Protect other Country Persuits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sign here,
and show Blair 
just how strong us Country folk are!
We will never give up, until you 
bring back our Fox Hunting!

rejection.details:
A similar petition is here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/huntingactrepeal/
If you wish your own petition to be submitted despite this, then please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
